nodes.documentation:
@notice Refund discount buy to liquidator
@param sale The Id of the sale
nodes.name: refund

accepted(bytes32).return: Bool that indicates whether Sale has been accepted

params.funds_: The address of the Funds contract
params.loans_: The address of the Loans contract
params.med_: The address of the Medianizer contract

params.pubKeyHash: The Bitcoin Public Key Hash of the Liquidator
params.secretHashA: The Secret Hash of the Borrower for the current sale number
params.secretHashB: The Secret Hash of the Lender for the current sale number
params.secretHashC: The Secret Hash of the Arbiter for the current sale number
params.secretHashD: the Secret Hash of the Liquidator

create(bytes32,address,address,address,a.return: sale The Id of the sale

discountBuy(bytes32).return: Value of the Discount Buy price

next(bytes32).return: Bool that indicates whether Sale has been terminated

off(bytes32).return: Bool that indicates whether Sale has been terminated

params.secret_: The secret provided by the borrower, lender, arbiter, or liquidator

params.secrets_: The secrets provided by the borrower, lender, arbiter, or liquidator

params.seizableSig: The Bitcoin seizable collateral signature     *         Note: More info on the collateral swap script can be seen here: https://github.com/AtomicLoans/chainabstractionlayer-loans

accept(bytes32).notice: Accept discount buy by liquidator and disperse funds to rightful parties

accepted(bytes32).notice: Get the accepted status of a Sale

create(bytes32,address,address,address,a.notice: Creates a new sale (called by the Loans contract)

discountBuy(bytes32).notice: Get Discount Buy price for a Sale

hasSecrets(bytes32).notice: Indicates that two of Secret A, Secret B, Secret C have been submitted

next(bytes32).notice: Get the next Sale for a Loan

off(bytes32).notice: Get the off status of a Sale

provideSecret(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Provide secret to enable liquidator to claim collateral

provideSecretsAndAccept(bytes32,bytes32[.notice: Provide secrets to enable liquidator to claim collateral then accept discount buy to disperse funds to rightful parties

provideSig(bytes32,bytes,bytes).notice: Provide Bitcoin signatures for moving collateral to collateral swap script

settlementExpiration(bytes32).notice: Get the Settlement Expiration of a Sale

swapExpiration(bytes32).notice: Get the Swap Expiration of a Sale
